name: redeem_voucher
attributes: # [doc = " バウチャーを消費して特別NFTをミントするが、"]
# [doc = " voucher_account.owner と ctx.accounts.user.key() の照合チェックがない"]
body: let voucher = & mut ctx . accounts . voucher_account ;
voucher . count = voucher . count . checked_sub (1) . unwrap () ;
voucher . redeemed = voucher . redeemed . checked_add (1) . unwrap () ;

let cpi_accounts = MintTo { mint : ctx . accounts . special_nft_mint . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . user_nft_account . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . mint_authority . to_account_info () , } ;
let cpi_ctx = CpiContext :: new (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , cpi_accounts) ;

fields.name: voucher_account
fields.attribute: # [account (mut)] # [doc = " 本来は #[account(has_one = owner)] を指定して所有者照合を行うべき"]

fields.name: user
fields.attribute: # [doc = " バウチャーを使うユーザー（署名者）"]

fields.name: mint_authority
fields.attribute: # [doc = " Mint権限を持つアカウント"]

fields.name: owner
fields.attribute: # [doc = " このバウチャーを所有すべきユーザーの Pubkey"]

fields.name: count
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 使用可能なバウチャー残数"]

fields.name: redeemed
fields.attribute: # [doc = " これまでに消費したバウチャー数"]
